soot.jimple.infoflow.android.source

Class AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.android.source.AndroidSourceSinkManager
      • soot.jimple.infoflow.android.source.AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.manager.IOneSourceAtATimeManager, soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.manager.ISourceSinkManager

    public class AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager
extends AndroidSourceSinkManager
    SourceSinkManager for Android applications. This class uses precise access path-based source and sink definitions.
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager

        public AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager(Set<soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.SourceSinkDefinition> sources,
                                        Set<soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.SourceSinkDefinition> sinks,
                                        InfoflowAndroidConfiguration config)
        Creates a new instance of the AndroidSourceSinkManager class with either strong or weak matching.
        Parameters:
        sources - The list of source methods
        sinks - The list of sink methods
        config - The configuration of the data flow analyzer

      • AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager

        public AccessPathBasedSourceSinkManager(Set<soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.SourceSinkDefinition> sources,
                                        Set<soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.SourceSinkDefinition> sinks,
                                        Set<CallbackDefinition> callbackMethods,
                                        InfoflowAndroidConfiguration config,
                                        Map<Integer,LayoutControl> layoutControls)
        Creates a new instance of the AndroidSourceSinkManager class with strong matching, i.e. the methods in the code must exactly match those in the list.
        Parameters:
        sources - The list of source methods
        sinks - The list of sink methods
        callbackMethods - The list of callback methods whose parameters are sources through which the application receives data from the operating system
        weakMatching - True for weak matching: If an entry in the list has no return type, it matches arbitrary return types if the rest of the method signature is compatible. False for strong matching: The method signature in the code exactly match the one in the list.
        config - The configuration of the data flow analyzer
        layoutControls - A map from reference identifiers to the respective Android layout controls
